10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir bin Samurah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came out to us and said:'Will you not form rows as the angels form rows before their Lord? They said: 'How do the angels form rows before their lord? He said: 'They complete the first row and fill the gaps in the rows

chapter.ara-name: باب حَثِّ الإِمَامِ عَلَى رَصِّ الصُّفُوفِ وَالْمُقَارَبَةِ بَيْنَهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Imam encouraging (worshippers) to make the rows solid and stand close to one another
